website_summaries.verdict: The CyberPower FangBook X7-200 gaming laptop delivers strong performance and a healthy feature set for less than two grand.
pros: Great performance from Intel Core i7-3630QM processor and Nvidia GeForce GTX 675MX graphics processor
Looks and sounds good with 1080p display and THX sound

customer_reviews.title: fantastic laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this laptop I was looking for a gaming laptop and believe I got it when it was on sale and a bargain it was, could play all the latest games and the speed is lightening, I've had the laptop almost a year now and is still as good when I first brought it, no problems since. I do love the red neon lighted keyboard aswell. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great value gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.text: The spec you get for the price is fantastic but this is sacrificed by build quality. This laptop does get hot when using the graphics accelerator and the fan booster is quite loud. I had an issue with the windows 8 because it was new to me but Cyberfang customer support were great and responded immediately to my query which is good. I would definitely recommend this laptop for gaming if you look after your tech.
customer_reviews.author: Sc0wler

customer_reviews.title: Not amazing but Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars as its a nice good gaming laptop Pros - looks awesome - runs games well - beautiful graphics Cons - Gave me wrong adapter with computer, if i didnt have a spare one from a old laptop wouldnt be able to use it. - Crashed few times now (only had it a week) - Slower then i expected All and all not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Great specs at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great specs at a very reasonable price. The item had a small software problem but when I asked the seller, he quickly responded and detailed how to fix the issue. The laptop performance is great and sounds is awesome. I would recommend the laptop to a casual gamer. This is not for a serious gamer though.
customer_reviews.author: Rizwan Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Shh! It's a Fangbook.
customer_reviews.text: Great Laptop but awfully quiet speakers. On max they are good quality but so low volume.
customer_reviews.author: Morien Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Response, Very Fast. Minor issue is on heavy processor heavy games, can get a little hot, but not enough that a USB fan cannot fix
customer_reviews.author: Alex F

customer_reviews.title: overheating
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop and performance all I would say is the laptop gets very hot and actually made one of the games close
customer_reviews.author: mrs a l worden

customer_reviews.title: only issue is no volume button have to do it ...
customer_reviews.text: only issue is no volume button have to do it on dashboard apart from that its a serious bit of kit
customer_reviews.author: pjrhodes1970

customer_reviews.title: 1st was faulty, 2nd was brilliant,
customer_reviews.text: 1st one was faulty, after I requested a replacement, it arrived within a week. Communication was excellent, brilliant laptop, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful gaming laptop that can run high performance games easily. The GTX 860M graphics card does its job in bringing you the best graphics and performance for playing games on such a subtle, beautiful laptop. NOTE: There is a cooling fan button on the very top left of the keyboard above the ESC key and I would advise using it when playing high performance games. The internal fan booster does a decent job as long as you turn it on as soon as you start up a game but I would recommend buying a seperate cooling fan in aid of this which you can attatch to the side vent just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Mouncer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speed & Performance! Brilliant value for money!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is excellent- it offers speed and performance for those on a tight budget! If you’re looking for a laptop which can handle both gaming and work, look no further! I was originally looking for a laptop to handle my daily work (spreadsheets, powerpoints, etc), but found it capable of gaming as well- beware, you WILL start gaming with this laptop!
customer_reviews.author: man811

customer_reviews.title: Luckily one of my friend strongly recommended the Cyberpower FANGBOOK
customer_reviews.text: I was always looking for a powerful gaming laptop for very long time. Luckily one of my friend strongly recommended the Cyberpower FANGBOOK. Then I've google the product specs and the user reviews. My founding was very positive. So I bought this laptop on amazon lately and I think I have really made a right decision! It is capable to smoothly run the latest games just like your desktop at home. Yet, without the disadvantage of the big, heavy and noisy computer fan tower!
customer_reviews.author: KitS

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. It is lighter than expected but can do a lot. It is a good quality build and the keyboard lighting is a bonus. He hasn't been off it since it was given to him. Best present I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: jennie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic laptop, had it for around a month now and have not touched my desktop for gaming since. Backlit keyboard looks amazing and the battery life (3 or so hours solid gaming) is much better than i expected.
customer_reviews.author: paul watson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Gaming Laptop handles every game my son throws at it. And also looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: anna patterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks exactly the same as the MSI ge60 apache pro
customer_reviews.author: Bartek

customer_reviews.title: Poor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop itself is ok but the screen is poor and the fan is just terrible....my nan had a laptop 10 years older on at the same time and you couldnt hear anything from hers however this is a month old and makes a massive racket when doing the simplest of things, very dissapointed for the price especially...
customer_reviews.author: Jamesey

product_meta.title: Cyberpower FANGBOOK EVO 15X2 15.6-Inch Notebook (Intel Core i7 4710MQ 2.5 GHz, 16 GB DDR3 RAM, 1 TB HDD, Windows 8.1)
product_meta.description:
The Cyberpower Gaming FANGBOOK EVO 15X2 is configured to have you gaming straight out of the box. The Intel Core i7-4710MQ CPU (2.5GHZ) is the latest Intel core i7 CPU and turbo's up to 3.5GHZ. Amazing performance and stunning visuals at their best. Get top-of-the-line performance for your most demanding tasks with a 4th generation Intel Core i7 processor. For a difference you can see and feel in HD and 3D, multitasking and multimedia, the 4th generation Intel Core i7 processor is perfect for all your most demanding tasks. Effortlessly move through applications with smart multitasking from Intel Hyper-Threading Technology. Enjoy the thrill of an automatic burst of speed when you need it with Intel Turbo Boost Technology 2.0. Experience your movies, photos, and games smoothly and seamlessly with a suite of built-in visual enhancements no extra hardware required. Get a boost in performance you can see and feel, along with longer battery life, built-in security for deeper protection, and extra peace of mind from enhanced security. Choose the 4th generation Intel Core i7 processor for whatever you want to accomplish. Because the only thing more amazing than Intel technology is what you′ll do with itThe dedicated GTX 860M 2GB GPU means you can enjoy playing all your favourite games at 1080p With GTX 860M, nothing will hold you back from taking on - and dominating - you're most challenging games. You can game on the 15.6" LED backlit screen or an external screen via HDMI.The Gaming Fangbook EVO 15X2 has been tested on MEDIUM settings and can achieve the following performance results at factory settings:Dirt Showdown 91 Average Frames per Seconds (FPS)*Battlefield 4 55 Average Frames per Seconds (FPS)*3D Mark 3598* The Cyberpower Gaming Fangbook EVO 15X comes with Windows 8.1 pre-installed and comes with a 1 year return to base warranty. With years of experience building high end gaming laptops quality is assured with Cyberpower. As always with Cyberpower you get all the latest technology included as standard, Including USB 3.0, backlit gaming keyboard, and a 720p HD webcam.*Dirt average FPS at 1920 x 1080 with 4x MSAA on MEDIUM settings on the built in Benchmark.*Battlefield 4 FPS at 1920 x 1080 on MEDIUM settings on "Singapore Intro" level.*3D Mark score based on The Firestrike benchmark

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Fangbook Evo 15X2
UK plug
Charger
Drivers
